game.name: Total War: SHOGUN 2 - The Ikko Ikki Clan Pack
game.shortDescription: The Ikko Ikki Clan Pack adds the iconic ‘warrior monk’ clan and a wide variety of brand-new content for use across the different game modes.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Ikko Ikki Clan Pack adds the iconic ‘warrior monk’ clan and a wide variety of brand-new content for use across the different game modes.
game.developers: The Creative Assembly, Feral Interactive (Mac), Feral Interactive (Linux)
